to.uri: sql:select s.id as dw_study_id, s.ae_key, fac.code as facility_code, s.accession_number, s.dtype as study_dtype, s.modality, s.patient_key, s.patient_age, pt.patient_id, pt.sex as patient_sex, CONCAT(IFNULL(pt.first_name,''), IFNULL(pt.middle_name,''), IFNULL(pt.last_name,'')) as patient_name, s.study_id, s.study_instance_uid, s.study_date, s.sd_key, sdesc.name as study_description, cts.ct_dose_length_product_total, cts.dlp_ssde, cts.exam_ctdi, cts.num_series, cts.protocol_key, se.id as dw_serie_id, ae.aet, se.serie_id, se.study_key, se.dtype as serie_dtype, se.series_date, se.target_region_key, se.effective_dose_in_msv, ctse.aapm_factor_ssde, ctse.ctdi_vol_ssde, ctse.dlp_ssde, ctse.end_series_time, ctse.start_slice_location, ctse.end_slice_location, ctse.protocol_key as series_protocol_key, sepl.name as series_protocol_name, sse.exposure_time, sse.dlp, sse.dt_last_update, pl.name as protocol_name, sd.name as series_description, CONCAT(ph.last_name, ph.first_name) as performing_physician, (unix_timestamp(sse.dt_last_update) + se.id) as joint_key from spiral_serie sse join ct_serie ctse on sse.id=ctse.id join serie se on ctse.id=se.id join study s on s.id=se.study_key join ct_study cts on s.id=cts.id join study_description sdesc on s.sd_key=sdesc.id join ae on ae.id=s.ae_key join facility fac on ae.facility_key = fac.id join series_description sd on se.series_description_key=sd.id left join patient pt on s.patient_key=pt.id left join protocol pl on cts.protocol_key=pl.id left join protocol sepl on ctse.protocol_key=sepl.id left join physician ph on s.performing_physician_key=ph.id where (unix_timestamp(sse.dt_last_update) + se.id) > :#${headers[JobObject].lastPolledValue} and se.series_date is not null order by joint_key asc limit 500?dataSource=dwMaster

sql:select s.id as dw_study_id, s.ae_key, fac.code as facility_code, s.accession_number, s.dtype as study_dtype, s.modality, s.patient_key, s.patient_age, pt.patient_id, pt.sex as patient_sex, CONCAT(IFNULL(pt.first_name,''), IFNULL(pt.middle_name,''), IFNULL(pt.last_name,'')) as patient_name, s.study_id, s.study_instance_uid, s.study_date, s.sd_key, sdesc.name as study_description, cts.ct_dose_length_product_total, cts.dlp_ssde, cts.exam_ctdi, cts.num_series, cts.protocol_key, se.id as dw_serie_id, ae.aet, se.serie_id, se.study_key, se.dtype as serie_dtype, se.series_date, se.target_region_key, se.effective_dose_in_msv, ctse.aapm_factor_ssde, ctse.ctdi_vol_ssde, ctse.dlp_ssde, ctse.end_series_time, ctse.start_slice_location, ctse.end_slice_location, ctse.protocol_key as series_protocol_key, sepl.name as series_protocol_name, cas.exposure_time, IFNULL(cas.dlp, 0), cas.dt_last_update, pl.name as protocol_name, sd.name as series_description, CONCAT(ph.last_name, ph.first_name) as performing_physician, (unix_timestamp(cas.dt_last_update) + se.id) as joint_key from constant_angle_serie cas join ct_serie ctse on cas.id=ctse.id join serie se on ctse.id=se.id join study s on s.id=se.study_key join ct_study cts on s.id=cts.id join study_description sdesc on s.sd_key=sdesc.id join ae on ae.id=s.ae_key join facility fac on ae.facility_key = fac.id join series_description sd on se.series_description_key=sd.id left join patient pt on s.patient_key=pt.id left join protocol pl on cts.protocol_key=pl.id left join protocol sepl on ctse.protocol_key=sepl.id left join physician ph on s.performing_physician_key=ph.id where (unix_timestamp(cas.dt_last_update) + se.id) > :#${headers[JobObject].lastPolledValue} and se.series_date is not null order by joint_key asc limit 500?dataSource=dwMaster

sql:select s.id as dw_study_id, s.ae_key, fac.code as facility_code, s.accession_number, s.dtype as study_dtype, s.modality, s.patient_key, s.patient_age, pt.patient_id, pt.sex as patient_sex, CONCAT(IFNULL(pt.first_name,''), IFNULL(pt.middle_name,''), IFNULL(pt.last_name,'')) as patient_name, s.study_id, s.study_instance_uid, s.study_date, s.sd_key, sdesc.name as study_description, cts.ct_dose_length_product_total, cts.dlp_ssde, cts.exam_ctdi, cts.num_series, cts.protocol_key, se.id as dw_serie_id, ae.aet, se.serie_id, se.study_key, se.dtype as serie_dtype, se.series_date, se.target_region_key, se.effective_dose_in_msv, ctse.aapm_factor_ssde, ctse.ctdi_vol_ssde, ctse.dlp_ssde, ctse.end_series_time, ctse.start_slice_location, ctse.end_slice_location, ctse.protocol_key as series_protocol_key, sepl.name as series_protocol_name, sse.exposure_time, sse.dt_last_update, sse.dlp, pl.name as protocol_name, sd.name as series_description, CONCAT(ph.last_name, ph.first_name) as performing_physician, (unix_timestamp(sse.dt_last_update) + se.id) as joint_key from stationary_serie sse join ct_serie ctse on sse.id=ctse.id join serie se on ctse.id=se.id join study s on s.id=se.study_key join ct_study cts on s.id=cts.id join study_description sdesc on s.sd_key=sdesc.id join ae on ae.id=s.ae_key join facility fac on ae.facility_key = fac.id join series_description sd on se.series_description_key=sd.id left join patient pt on s.patient_key=pt.id left join protocol pl on cts.protocol_key=pl.id left join protocol sepl on ctse.protocol_key=sepl.id left join physician ph on s.performing_physician_key=ph.id where (unix_timestamp(sse.dt_last_update) + se.id) > :#${headers[JobObject].lastPolledValue} and se.series_date is not null order by joint_key asc limit 500?dataSource=dwMaster

sql:select s.id as dw_study_id, s.ae_key, fac.code as facility_code, s.accession_number, s.dtype as study_dtype, s.modality, s.patient_key, s.patient_age, pt.patient_id, pt.sex as patient_sex, CONCAT(IFNULL(pt.first_name,''), IFNULL(pt.middle_name,''), IFNULL(pt.last_name,'')) as patient_name, s.study_id, s.study_instance_uid, s.study_date, s.sd_key, sdesc.name as study_description, cts.ct_dose_length_product_total, cts.dlp_ssde, cts.exam_ctdi, cts.num_series, cts.protocol_key, se.id as dw_serie_id, ae.aet, se.serie_id, se.study_key, se.dtype as serie_dtype, se.series_date, se.target_region_key, se.effective_dose_in_msv, ctse.aapm_factor_ssde, ctse.ctdi_vol_ssde, ctse.dlp_ssde, ctse.end_series_time, ctse.start_slice_location, ctse.end_slice_location, ctse.protocol_key as series_protocol_key, sepl.name as series_protocol_name, cse.exposure_time, cse.dlp, cse.dt_last_update, pl.name as protocol_name, sd.name as series_description, CONCAT(ph.last_name, ph.first_name) as performing_physician, (unix_timestamp(cse.dt_last_update) + se.id) as joint_key from cine_serie cse join ct_serie ctse on cse.id=ctse.id join serie se on ctse.id=se.id join study s on s.id=se.study_key join ct_study cts on s.id=cts.id join study_description sdesc on s.sd_key=sdesc.id join ae on ae.id=s.ae_key join facility fac on ae.facility_key = fac.id join series_description sd on se.series_description_key=sd.id left join patient pt on s.patient_key=pt.id left join protocol pl on cts.protocol_key=pl.id left join protocol sepl on ctse.protocol_key=sepl.id left join physician ph on s.performing_physician_key=ph.id where (unix_timestamp(cse.dt_last_update) + se.id) > :#${headers[JobObject].lastPolledValue} and se.series_date is not null order by joint_key asc limit 500?dataSource=dwMaster

sql:select s.id as dw_study_id, s.ae_key, fac.code as facility_code, s.accession_number, s.dtype as study_dtype, s.modality, s.patient_key, s.patient_age, pt.patient_id, pt.sex as patient_sex, CONCAT(IFNULL(pt.first_name,''), IFNULL(pt.middle_name,''), IFNULL(pt.last_name,'')) as patient_name, s.study_id, s.study_instance_uid, s.study_date, s.sd_key, sdesc.name as study_description, cts.ct_dose_length_product_total, cts.dlp_ssde, cts.exam_ctdi, cts.num_series, cts.protocol_key, se.id as dw_serie_id, ae.aet, se.serie_id, se.study_key, se.dtype as serie_dtype, se.series_date, se.target_region_key, se.effective_dose_in_msv, ctse.aapm_factor_ssde, ctse.ctdi_vol_ssde, ctse.dlp_ssde, ctse.end_series_time, ctse.start_slice_location, ctse.end_slice_location, ctse.protocol_key as series_protocol_key, sepl.name as series_protocol_name, sse.exposure_time, sse.dlp, sse.dt_last_update, pl.name as protocol_name, sd.name as series_description, CONCAT(ph.last_name, ph.first_name) as performing_physician, (unix_timestamp(sse.dt_last_update) + se.id) as joint_key from sequenced_serie sse join ct_serie ctse on sse.id=ctse.id join serie se on ctse.id=se.id join study s on s.id=se.study_key join ct_study cts on s.id=cts.id join study_description sdesc on s.sd_key=sdesc.id join ae on ae.id=s.ae_key join facility fac on ae.facility_key = fac.id join series_description sd on se.series_description_key=sd.id left join patient pt on s.patient_key=pt.id left join protocol pl on cts.protocol_key=pl.id left join protocol sepl on ctse.protocol_key=sepl.id left join physician ph on s.performing_physician_key=ph.id where (unix_timestamp(sse.dt_last_update) + se.id) > :#${headers[JobObject].lastPolledValue} and se.series_date is not null order by joint_key asc limit 500?dataSource=dwMaster

sql:select s.id as dw_study_id, s.ae_key, fac.code as facility_code, s.accession_number, s.dtype as study_dtype, s.modality, s.patient_key, s.patient_age, pt.patient_id, pt.sex as patient_sex, CONCAT(IFNULL(pt.first_name,''), IFNULL(pt.middle_name,''), IFNULL(pt.last_name,'')) as patient_name, s.study_id, s.study_instance_uid, s.study_date, s.sd_key, sdesc.name as study_description, cts.ct_dose_length_product_total, cts.dlp_ssde, cts.exam_ctdi, cts.num_series, cts.protocol_key, se.id as dw_serie_id, ae.aet, se.serie_id, se.study_key, se.dtype as serie_dtype, se.series_date, se.target_region_key, se.effective_dose_in_msv, ctse.aapm_factor_ssde, ctse.ctdi_vol_ssde, ctse.dlp_ssde, ctse.end_series_time, ctse.start_slice_location, ctse.end_slice_location, ctse.protocol_key as series_protocol_key, sepl.name as series_protocol_name, sse.exposure_time, sse.dlp, sse.dt_last_update, pl.name as protocol_name, sd.name as series_description, CONCAT(ph.last_name, ph.first_name) as performing_physician, (unix_timestamp(sse.dt_last_update) + se.id) as joint_key from smartprep_serie sse join ct_serie ctse on sse.id=ctse.id join serie se on ctse.id=se.id join study s on s.id=se.study_key join ct_study cts on s.id=cts.id join study_description sdesc on s.sd_key=sdesc.id join ae on ae.id=s.ae_key join facility fac on ae.facility_key = fac.id join series_description sd on se.series_description_key=sd.id left join patient pt on s.patient_key=pt.id left join protocol pl on cts.protocol_key=pl.id left join protocol sepl on ctse.protocol_key=sepl.id left join physician ph on s.performing_physician_key=ph.id where (unix_timestamp(sse.dt_last_update) + se.id) > :#${headers[JobObject].lastPolledValue} and se.series_date is not null order by joint_key asc limit 500?dataSource=dwMaster

sql:select s.id as dw_study_id, s.ae_key, fac.code as facility_code, s.accession_number, s.dtype as study_dtype, s.modality, s.patient_key, s.patient_age, pt.patient_id, pt.sex as patient_sex, CONCAT(IFNULL(pt.first_name,''), IFNULL(pt.middle_name,''), IFNULL(pt.last_name,'')) as patient_name, s.study_id, s.study_instance_uid, s.study_date, s.sd_key, sdesc.name as study_description, cts.ct_dose_length_product_total, cts.dlp_ssde, cts.exam_ctdi, cts.num_series, cts.protocol_key, se.id as dw_serie_id, ae.aet, se.serie_id, se.study_key, se.dtype as serie_dtype, se.series_date, se.target_region_key, se.effective_dose_in_msv, ctse.aapm_factor_ssde, ctse.ctdi_vol_ssde, ctse.dlp_ssde, ctse.end_series_time, ctse.start_slice_location, ctse.end_slice_location, ctse.protocol_key as series_protocol_key, sepl.name as series_protocol_name, us.exposure_time, us.dlp, us.dt_last_update, pl.name as protocol_name, sd.name as series_description, CONCAT(ph.last_name, ph.first_name) as performing_physician, (unix_timestamp(us.dt_last_update) + se.id) as joint_key from undefined_serie us join ct_serie ctse on us.id=ctse.id join serie se on ctse.id=se.id join study s on s.id=se.study_key join ct_study cts on s.id=cts.id join study_description sdesc on s.sd_key=sdesc.id join ae on ae.id=s.ae_key join facility fac on ae.facility_key = fac.id join series_description sd on se.series_description_key=sd.id left join patient pt on s.patient_key=pt.id left join protocol pl on cts.protocol_key=pl.id left join protocol sepl on ctse.protocol_key=sepl.id left join physician ph on s.performing_physician_key=ph.id where (unix_timestamp(us.dt_last_update) + se.id) > :#${headers[JobObject].lastPolledValue} and se.series_date is not null order by joint_key asc limit 500?dataSource=dwMaster

sql:select s.id as dw_study_id, s.ae_key, fac.code as facility_code, s.accession_number, s.dtype as study_dtype, s.modality, s.patient_key, s.patient_age, pt.patient_id, pt.sex as patient_sex, CONCAT(IFNULL(pt.first_name,''), IFNULL(pt.middle_name,''), IFNULL(pt.last_name,'')) as patient_name, s.study_id, s.study_instance_uid, s.study_date, s.sd_key, sdesc.name as study_description, se.id as dw_serie_id, ae.aet, se.serie_id, se.study_key, se.dtype as serie_dtype, se.series_date, m.code as mf_code, CASE WHEN mrse.column_09 is not null THEN CONVERT(CAST(CONVERT(mrse.column_09,decimal(14)) AS CHAR), DATETIME) WHEN mrse.acquisition_datetime is not null THEN mrse.acquisition_datetime END as acquisition_datetime, CASE WHEN 'SIEMENS'=m.code THEN IFNULL(mrse.column_02, 0) ELSE IFNULL(mrse.acquisition_duration, 0)/1000000 END as acquisition_duration, mrse.protocol_key, pl.name as protocol_name, mrse.start_slice_location, mrse.end_slice_location, sd.name as series_description, mrse.dt_last_update, CONCAT(ph.last_name, ph.first_name) as performing_physician, (unix_timestamp(mrse.dt_last_update) + se.id) as joint_key from mr_serie mrse join serie se on mrse.id=se.id join study s on s.id=se.study_key join study_description sdesc on s.sd_key=sdesc.id join ae on ae.id=s.ae_key join facility fac on ae.facility_key = fac.id join supported_device_model sdm on ae.sdm_key=sdm.id join manufacturer m on sdm.manufacturer_key=m.id join series_description sd on se.series_description_key=sd.id left join protocol pl on mrse.protocol_key=pl.id left join patient pt on s.patient_key=pt.id left join physician ph on s.performing_physician_key=ph.id where (unix_timestamp(mrse.dt_last_update) + se.id) > :#${headers[JobObject].lastPolledValue} and (mrse.column_09 is not null or mrse.acquisition_datetime is not null) order by joint_key asc limit 500?dataSource=dwMaster

sql:select s.id as dw_study_id, s.ae_key, fac.code as facility_code, s.accession_number, s.dtype as study_dtype, s.modality, s.patient_key, s.patient_age, pt.patient_id, pt.sex as patient_sex, CONCAT(IFNULL(pt.first_name,''), IFNULL(pt.middle_name,''), IFNULL(pt.last_name,'')) as patient_name, s.study_id, s.study_instance_uid, s.study_date, s.sd_key, sdesc.name as study_description, xas.ifadp*100 as dap, xas.fluoro_dap*100 as fluoro_dap, xas.record_dap*100 as record_dap, se.id as dw_serie_id, ae.aet, se.serie_id, se.study_key, se.dtype as serie_dtype, se.series_date, se.effective_dose_in_msv, xase.exposure_time/1000 as exposure_time, se.target_region_key as target_region, sedesc.name as series_description, xase.protocol_key, pl.name as protocol_name, xase.serie_type, xase.series_sub_type as series_sub_type, xase.dose_area_product*100 as serie_dap, xase.dt_last_update, CONCAT(ph.last_name, ph.first_name) as performing_physician, (unix_timestamp(xase.dt_last_update) + se.id) as joint_key from xa_serie xase join serie se on xase.id=se.id join study s on s.id=se.study_key join xa_study xas on s.id=xas.id join study_description sdesc on s.sd_key=sdesc.id join series_description sedesc on se.series_description_key=sedesc.id join ae on ae.id=s.ae_key join facility fac on ae.facility_key = fac.id left join protocol pl on xase.protocol_key=pl.id left join patient pt on s.patient_key=pt.id left join physician ph on s.performing_physician_key=ph.id where (unix_timestamp(xase.dt_last_update) + se.id) > :#${headers[JobObject].lastPolledValue} and se.series_date is not null and xase.exposure_time is not null order by joint_key asc limit 500?dataSource=dwMaster

sql:select s.id as dw_study_id, s.ae_key, fac.code as facility_code, s.accession_number, s.dtype as study_dtype, s.modality, s.patient_key, s.patient_age, pt.patient_id, pt.sex as patient_sex, CONCAT(IFNULL(pt.first_name,''), IFNULL(pt.middle_name,''), IFNULL(pt.last_name,'')) as patient_name, s.study_id, s.study_instance_uid, s.study_date, s.sd_key, sdesc.name as study_description, nms.radioisotope_mapping_key, nrm.original_name as radioisotope_name, nms.total_administ_activ_in_megabq as administered_activity, nms.injection_time, se.id as dw_serie_id, ae.aet, se.serie_id, se.study_key, se.dtype as serie_dtype, se.series_date, se.target_region_key as target_region, sedesc.name as series_description, nmse.protocol_key, pl.name as protocol_name, se.dt_last_update, CONCAT(ph.last_name, ph.first_name) as performing_physician, (unix_timestamp(se.dt_last_update) + se.id) as joint_key from nm_serie nmse join serie se on nmse.id=se.id join study s on s.id=se.study_key join nm_study nms on s.id=nms.id join study_description sdesc on s.sd_key=sdesc.id join series_description sedesc on se.series_description_key=sedesc.id join ae on ae.id=s.ae_key join facility fac on ae.facility_key = fac.id left join nm_radioisotope_mapping nrm on nms.radioisotope_mapping_key = nrm.id left join protocol pl on nmse.protocol_key=pl.id left join patient pt on s.patient_key=pt.id left join physician ph on s.performing_physician_key=ph.id where (unix_timestamp(se.dt_last_update) + se.id) > :#${headers[JobObject].lastPolledValue} and s.study_date is not null order by joint_key asc limit 500?dataSource=dwMaster

sql:select ae.id, ae.aet, ae.device_type, sdm.name as device_model, m.code as mf_code, fac.code as facility_code, ae.name as name, ae.station_name, ae.timezone, ae.dt_last_update from ae join supported_device_model sdm on ae.sdm_key=sdm.id join manufacturer m on sdm.manufacturer_key=m.id join facility fac on ae.facility_key = fac.id where ae.deleted = 0 and ae.dt_last_update > :#${headers[JobObject].lastPolledValue} order by ae.dt_last_update asc;?dataSource=dwMaster

sql:select ae.aet, s.modality, s.id as dw_study_id, fac.code as facility_code from study s join ae on s.ae_key=ae.id join facility fac on ae.facility_key = fac.id where date_format(study_date,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d');?dataSource=dwMaster
